issue.title: [C++] Add other common round mode names to RoundMode docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14779](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14779). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should add other common names for rounding modes to the docstrings in RoundMode for easy scanning (e.g. note that TOWARDS_INFINITY is often called AWAY_FROM_ZERO).
